headline: Why BofA are buyers of weakness in this sector
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America analyst Ross Fowler told investors in a note Monday that 2026 is shaping up to be a year of selective stock picking for U.S. power and utilities, arguing that recent pullbacks are creating attractive entry points in parts of the sector.
